pages.title: Weapon Materials
pages.text: These materials grant combat-focused effects that enhance your weapons.

pages.title: Quartz
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Sharpness (Damage) +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() White$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Swords and axes$(br2)Increases attack damage by +1.0. The foundation of every warrior!

pages.title: Lapis Lazuli
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Looting +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Deep Blue$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Mob farming swords$(br2)Increases mob drop quantities!

pages.title: Blaze Rod
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Fire Aspect +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Orange-Red$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Combat weapons$(br2)Sets enemies on fire for 7 seconds!

pages.title: Slime Ball
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Knockback +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Light Green$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Defensive weapons$(br2)Pushes enemies away from you!

pages.title: Eye of Ender
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Critical Strike +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Sea Green$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() High-damage weapons$(br2)Chance to deal critical damage!

pages.title: Glistering Melon
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Life Steal +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Deep Pink$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Sustain weapons$(br2)Heals you for 10% of damage dealt!

pages.title: Wither Skeleton Skull
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Execute +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Black$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Boss killers$(br2)Massive bonus damage to low-HP enemies!

pages.title: Spider Eye
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Venomous (Poison) +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Dark Magenta$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() DoT weapons$(br2)Inflicts Poison II for 5 seconds!

pages.title: Fermented Spider Eye
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Enfeebling Strike (Weakness) +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Indigo$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Defensive weapons$(br2)Reduces enemy attack damage!

pages.title: Zombie Head
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Beheading +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Dark Olive$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Trophy hunting$(br2)Chance to collect mob heads!

pages.title: Lodestone
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Gravity Tether +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Dark Gray$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Crowd control weapons$(br2)Creates a gravitational pull that draws enemies and items toward you!
